mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses(name, category_id, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{description})
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.category_id as categoryId, cc.name AS categoryName FROM courses c LEFT JOIN course_categories cc ON c.category_id = cc.id
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY c.id DESC
